org.gruth.tools

Class SimpleAssertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gruth.tools.SimpleAssertion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleAssertion
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Many instances of this report element may be gathered into a more global test report. Avoid using constructors directly and prefer the factories defined in the SingleTestReport class (that creates SimpleAssertion instances and register them in a SingleTestReport report.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • diag

        private Diag diag
        The required diagnostic. Mandatory field

      • caught

        private java.lang.Throwable caught
        Optional field (may be null). Programmers should take care that the corresponding object should be Serializable

      • messageText

        private transient java.lang.String messageText
        Mandatory field (but could be an empty String). This field might be managed a MessageFormat pattern String (and used as a key for a I18N ResourceBundle).

      • args

        private transient java.lang.Object[] args
        Mandatory field (but could be a zero length array). The Objects may be used as argument to the MessageFormat pattern. If the current report is serialized this array will be used to format the message and then will be emptied (because some objects may not be Serializable
